Text: 5 days and not a single comment on quality or torrent....anybody anything??? will tell after complete

Picture quality is great but there's no sound!
This is what came up when I tried to play it - 

You may need an additional audio decoder to play the soundtrack of this file.
This file contains a track in the Dolby AC3 Audio (code "8192") format. You may need to install a DirectShow decoder for this audio format in order to hear the soundtrack of this file.

I'm really not sure what to do now, any suggestions?

I found a solution that works! :)

For AC3 DirectShow decoder (code 8192) FOR MAC go to-
http://www.perian.org/
Perian claims to be a Quicktime Component but it DOES work with Divx.

I've been advised that this works for Windows-
http://www.moviecodec.com/download-audio-codecs/ac3-filter-20/
A10 V10 I use the cccp codec pack and didn't have any trouble with the sound.
